FuncDef:
The slave switchover enable command enables the forcible master/slave control board switchover function.
The slave switchover disable command disables the forcible master/slave control board switchover function.
The undo slave switchover disable command enables the forcible master/slave control board switchover function.
The forcible master/slave control board switchover function is enabled by default.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the forcible master/slave control board switchover function is enabled, the slave switchover command can be run to manually perform a master/slave control board switchover.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the slave switchover command to manually perform a master/slave control board switchover.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
